text: The 2017 Asian Weightlifting Championships were held in Ashgabat, Turkmenistan between April 23 and April 29, 2017. It was the 47th men's and 28th women's championship. ==Medal summary== ===Men=== {| |- !colspan=7|56 kg |- |Snatch | || 124 kg | || 123 kg | || 123 kg |- |Clean & Jerk | || 150 kg | || 149 kg | || 147
